reference/HuduAPI.Records.Companies.html.title: Class Companies | HuduAPI
reference/HuduAPI.Records.Companies.html.keywords: Class Companies Companies represents the list of companies returned from a call to the Companies Endpoint. Inheritance System.Object Companies Implements IRecord Namespace : HuduAPI.Records Assembly : HuduAPI.dll Syntax public class Companies : IRecord Remarks Companies is a very simple object that contains a List of Company objects. Along with a Indexer to allow easy access to individual companies based on Company ID. Constructors | Improve this Doc View Source Companies(IList<Company>) Initializes a new instance of the Companies class with the supplied list of Company objects. Declaration public Companies(IList<Company> companyList) Parameters Type Name Description IList < Company > companyList The list of Company objects. Properties | Improve this Doc View Source CompanyList Declaration [JsonProperty("Companies")] public IList<Company> CompanyList { get; set; } Property Value Type Description IList < Company > | Improve this Doc View Source Item[Int32] Gets the System.Nullable<T> with the a company ID of value index. If a company does not existing with this ID, then null is returend. Declaration public Company this[int id] { get; } Parameters Type Name Description System.Int32 id The company ID of the required company Property Value Type Description Company A Company with the company id of the value supplied to index. Implements IRecord
